long_desc.thetext:
Latest upstream release: 4.1
Current version/release in Fedora Rawhide: 4.0-0.3.beta3.fc21
URL: http://drupal.org/project/webform

Please consult the package updates policy before you issue an update to a stable branch: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Updates_Policy


More information about the service that created this bug can be found at:
https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Upstream_release_monitoring Soon this service will be implemented by a new system: https://github.com/fedora-infra/anitya/
It will require to manage monitored projects via a new web interface. Please make yourself familiar with the new system to ease the transition.

Current version/release in Fedora Rawhide: 4.1-1.fc22

Please consult the package updates policy before you issue an update to a stable branch: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Updates_Policy


More information about the service that created this bug can be found at:
https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Upstream_release_monitoring Soon this service will be implemented by a new system: https://release-monitoring.org/
It will require to manage monitored projects via a new web interface. Please make yourself familiar with the new system to ease the transition.

drupal7-webform-4.2-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-webform-4.2-1.el6

drupal7-webform-4.2-1.fc20 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 20.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-webform-4.2-1.fc20

drupal7-webform-4.2-1.fc21 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 21.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-webform-4.2-1.fc21

Package drupal7-webform-4.2-1.el6:
* should fix your issue,
* was pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing repository,
* should be available at your local mirror within two days.
Update it with:
# su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=epel-testing drupal7-webform-4.2-1.el6'
as soon as you are able to.
Please go to the following url:
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2014-4902/drupal7-webform-4.2-1.el6
then log in and leave karma (feedback).
